Sarah Hassan (a mụrụ na 5 Septemba 1988) bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe nlereanya na onye bụbu onye na-ahụ maka TV nke pụtara na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na usoro telivishọn
Ọ bụ onye ama ama maka ọrụ ya na usoro Citizen TV dịka, Tahidi High, The Wedding Show na Zora
A mụrụ Sarah Hassan na Septemba 5,1988 na Mombasa, Kenya dịka naanị nwa nne na nna ya

Na mbido ndụ ya, ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ ise. Maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, ọ gara Machakos Girls High School ma mesịa sonye na Jomo Kenyatta University Of Agriculture and Technology, ebe ọ gụrụ Bachelors of Science na Actuarial Science.
Hassan mere nke mbụ ya na TV n'afọ 2009 dịka Tanya, na usoro ihe nkiri ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke Kenya Tahidi High wee bụrụ otu n'ime ndị isi n'oge ahụ
O sonyekwara n'ọtụtụ usoro; Demigods, Saints and Changes, ọbụnakwa gaa n'ihu na-akwado ihe ngosi East African Dance Sakata Mashariki
N'afọ 2013, ọ weghaara ọrụ Noni Gathoni na The Wedding Show dịka onye isi na-elekọta ya ruo n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2014
E wezụga ime ihe nkiri, ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya na ọtụtụ ụdị ejiji Kenya. Ọ bi ugbu a na Nairobi, Kenya.
Sara Hassan lụrụ Martin Dale na Febụwarị 25, 2017 ma ha mo nwa nwoke.
